mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM )) AS RowNumber,
A.* FROM OPN.VKD0102 A
A.TEST_ENVR_DSCD = #{environment1}
AND A.OPRT_YMD BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
AND A.OPRT_AREA_NM LIKE '%' || #{location} || '%'
AND A.ILMN_CL_NM = #{sunlight}
AND A.OPRT_SPED_VAL BETWEEN #{lowVelocity} AND #{highVelocity}
AND WTHR_DS_NM = #{weather}
AND A.ROAD_CRCM_CLCD = #{conditions}
AND DATA_TYPE = #{learningType}
AND PSTN_NO = #{learningType2}
AND SEN_TP = #{senTp}
AND (
OR HUMN_GRUP_CNT > 0
OR PASG_CNT > 0
OR TRCK_CNT > 0
OR BUS_CNT > 0
OR SPAC_CNT > 0
OR MTCY_CNT > 0
OR bet_mdst_cnt > 0
OR brm_crsw_cnt > 0
OR brm_stln_cnt > 0
OR brs_rdwk_cnt > 0
OR brs_stop_cnt > 0
OR brs_stln_cnt > 0
OR brs_etc_cnt > 0
OR brs_crsw_cnt > 0
OR btl_bs_cnt > 0
OR btl_bus_cnt > 0
OR btl_vhcl_cnt > 0
OR btl_pds_cnt > 0
OR brm_sdbp_cnt > 0
OR brm_pcad_cnt > 0
OR brm_dnir_cnt > 0
OR brm_yd_cnt > 0
OR brs_desy_cnt > 0
OR brs_sfcn_cnt > 0
OR brs_norl_cnt > 0
OR brs_drze_cnt > 0
OR brs_nout_cnt > 0
OR brs_oewy_cnt > 0
OR brs_hiwy_cnt > 0
OR brs_bs_cnt > 0
OR brs_nopk_cnt > 0
OR brs_pkar_cnt > 0
OR brs_nosd_cnt > 0
OR brs_noen_cnt > 0
OR brs_hilt_cnt > 0
OR brs_welt_cnt > 0
OR brs_mxsp_cnt > 0
OR brs_misp_cnt > 0
OR brs_nopg_cnt > 0
OR brs_nopa_cnt > 0
OR brs_rdat_cnt > 0
OR brs_nocr_cnt > 0
OR set_mdst_cnt > 0
OR srm_crsw_cnt > 0
OR srm_stln_cnt > 0
OR srs_rdwk_cnt > 0
OR srs_stop_cnt > 0
OR srs_stln_cnt > 0
OR srs_etc_cnt > 0
OR srm_crsw_cnt > 0
OR stl_bs_cnt > 0
OR stl_bus_cnt > 0
OR stl_vhcl_cnt > 0
OR stl_pds_cnt > 0
OR srm_sdbp_cnt > 0
OR srm_pcad_cnt > 0
OR srm_dnir_cnt > 0
OR srm_yd_cnt > 0
OR srs_desy_cnt > 0
OR srs_sfcn_cnt > 0
OR srs_norl_cnt > 0
OR srs_drze_cnt > 0
OR srs_nout_cnt > 0
OR srs_oewy_cnt > 0
OR srs_hiwy_cnt > 0
OR srs_bs_cnt > 0
OR srs_nopk_cnt > 0
OR srs_pkar_cnt > 0
OR srs_nosd_cnt > 0
OR srs_noen_cnt > 0
OR srs_hilt_cnt > 0
OR srs_welt_cnt > 0
OR srs_mxsp_cnt > 0
OR srs_misp_cnt > 0
OR srs_nopg_cnt > 0
OR srs_nopa_cnt > 0
OR srs_rdat_cnt > 0
OR srs_nocr_cnt > 0
)
) T WHERE T.rownumber > ((#{page}-1)*100)
AND T.rownumber < = #{countNumber}
AND T.rownumber < = #{page}*100

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.OPRT_YMD, A.OPRT_TM )) AS RowNumber, A.* FROM OPN.VKD0102 A
A.TEST_ENVR_DSCD = #{environment1}
AND A.OPRT_YMD BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
AND A.OPRT_AREA_NM LIKE '%' || #{location} || '%'
AND A.ILMN_CL_NM = #{sunlight}
AND A.OPRT_SPED_VAL BETWEEN #{lowVelocity} AND #{highVelocity}
AND WTHR_DS_NM = #{weather}
AND A.ROAD_CRCM_CLCD = #{conditions}
AND SEN_TP = #{senTp}
AND DATA_TYPE = #{learningType}
AND PSTN_NO = #{learningType2}
OR HUMN_GRUP_CNT > 0
OR PASG_CNT > 0
OR TRCK_CNT > 0
OR BUS_CNT > 0
OR SPAC_CNT > 0
OR MTCY_CNT > 0
AND (
OR HUMN_GRUP_CNT > 0

OR brs_nocr_cnt > 0
OR set_mdst_cnt > 0
OR srm_crsw_cnt > 0
OR srm_stln_cnt > 0
OR srs_rdwk_cnt > 0
OR srs_stop_cnt > 0

OR srs_etc_cnt > 0
OR srm_crsw_cnt > 0
OR stl_bs_cnt > 0
OR stl_bus_cnt > 0
OR stl_vhcl_cnt > 0
OR stl_pds_cnt > 0
OR srm_sdbp_cnt > 0
OR srm_pcad_cnt > 0
OR srm_dnir_cnt > 0
OR srm_yd_cnt > 0
OR srs_desy_cnt > 0
OR srs_sfcn_cnt > 0
OR srs_norl_cnt > 0
OR srs_drze_cnt > 0
OR srs_nout_cnt > 0
OR srs_oewy_cnt > 0
OR srs_hiwy_cnt > 0
OR srs_bs_cnt > 0
OR srs_nopk_cnt > 0
OR srs_pkar_cnt > 0
OR srs_nosd_cnt > 0
OR srs_noen_cnt > 0
OR srs_hilt_cnt > 0
OR srs_welt_cnt > 0
OR srs_mxsp_cnt > 0
OR srs_misp_cnt > 0
OR srs_nopg_cnt > 0
OR srs_nopa_cnt > 0
OR srs_rdat_cnt > 0
OR srs_nocr_cnt > 0
)
) T
WHERE T.rownumber >= #{page}
WHERE T.rownumber > = #{page}+1
AND T.rownumber <= #{page2}
